common.slogan: Sharing the love of Christ to change the world
common.name: Name

home.title: Vases d'Honneur Tanger
home.subtitle: Sharing the love of Christ to change the world
home.description: A welcoming community where everyone can grow in faith and discover their potential in Christ
home.upcomingEventsDesc: Join us to experience powerful moments together
home.gaspardTestimonial: Since I've been attending Vases d'Honneur, I've experienced a true metamorphosis. It's a 360-degree growth: my spiritual life has intensified and my heart has been restored. Making God my absolute priority has been the key to this flourishing in every area.
home.newVisitorsDesc: You are welcome! Come as you are. We are a welcoming community that believes in the power of Christ's love to transform lives.
home.welcomingCommunityDesc: A warm environment where everyone finds their place
home.unconditionalLoveDesc: Come as you are, you will be accepted
home.giveLifeToChrist: I want to give my life to Christ
home.giveLifeToChristDesc: Discover how to start your relationship with Jesus
home.receivePrayerDesc: We pray for you and your needs
home.ourAssembliesDesc: Are you passing through Rabat or Casablanca? Find our other Vases d'Honneur assemblies in these cities.
home.royalAssemblyDesc: Join our assembly in Rabat to experience powerful moments of fellowship and worship.
home.forceAssemblyDesc: Connect with our assembly in Casablanca to grow in faith together.
home.followedByCommunion: Followed by a time of fellowship

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Discover who we are, our mission and our vision for Tangier and beyond
about.historyDesc1: Vases d'Honneur Church is an evangelical church founded in 2002 and led by Pastor Mohammed SANOGO.
about.historyDesc2: Our goal is to lead Christians to manifest the reign of God, by making men, women and youth who influence the world through the quality of their lives and to be true Vessels of Honor, by equipping each member for their ministry in the church and their mission in this world, in order to glorify the Name of the Lord.
about.historyDesc3: We are part of the Life Organization which aims to spread the good news of the gospel in the nations, but also and above all to ensure that after our passage the gospel remains active and permanent.
about.historyDesc4: Vases d'Honneur Church wants to raise up honorable Christians useful in the hands of the Lord for the true coming of the reign of God in our nation and throughout the world.
about.visionSubtitle: Sharing the love of Christ to change the world
about.valuesIntro: The core values of Vases d'Honneur, a Christian church, are excellence in serving God, training believers (discipleship), prayer, biblical knowledge, living in grace, renunciation, and promoting solid faith and positive impact in the community, aiming to train Good Workers in the Service of the Lord (BOSS).
about.excellenceDesc: Serving God with the best, with rigor and total commitment, as an acceptable sacrifice.
about.discipleshipDesc: Training accomplished disciples through the Vases d'Honneur Academy for solid faith.
about.prayerDesc: Times of prayer, biblical sharing and mutual encouragement (Honor Families).
about.christianLifeDesc: Focusing on prayer, knowledge of the Word, living in grace and renunciation.
about.missionDesc: Developing gifts and talents to proclaim the gospel and serve the Lord.
about.impactDesc: Having a positive impact in the neighborhoods.
about.joinUsDesc: You are welcome! Come discover a community that welcomes you as you are.
about.gallerySubtitle: Discover our activities and moments of fellowship
about.activitiesWithLumiereDesc: Our activities carried out in partnership with the Lumière des Nations association in Tangier
about.worshipServicesDesc: Some moments from our services and celebrations

give.title: Give
give.subtitle: Your generosity helps advance God's work and bless our community
give.messagesOfLifeDesc: The Messages of Life Ministry, led by Pastor Mohammed Sanogo, works to spread the gospel throughout the nations.
give.jesusSavesDesc: Participate in the "Jesus Saves" evangelization campaign that touches millions of lives around the world.
give.campaignINDesc: Support Pastor Mohamed Sanogo's IN campaign for the expansion of God's Kingdom.
give.tangerDonationsDesc: To make a donation directly to Vases d'Honneur Tanger church, contact us by phone.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Vases d'Honneur Tanger is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information.
privacy.dataCollectionDesc: We only collect information that you voluntarily provide to us through our contact forms or when you participate in our activities.
privacy.dataUseDesc: Your data is used only to respond to your requests, contact you regarding our activities and improve our services.
privacy.dataProtectionDesc: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access.
privacy.contactUsDesc: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, contact us at hello@vasesdhonneurtanger.org

legal.title: Legal Notice
